body: antipathy, aura of greater courage, bane, blessing of courage and life, calm animals, calm emotions, castigate, castigate (mass), cause fear, crushing despair, doom, euphoric tranquility, eyebite, fear, forced repentance, good hope, hunter's howl, moonstruck, phantasmal killer, phantasmal revenge, rage, rally point, scare, shared wrath, symbol of fear, sympathy, weapon of awe, weird, wrath.
name: Emotion
